recommended_actions.title: Improve audit-stats.mjs audit-tagged reporting
recommended_actions.notes: audit-stats.mjs reports '0 done' for audit-tagged items because it only checks active queue, not archive. Consider adding archive scan to show completed audit items for better visibility.
